docs.snippet: Paul Goldschmidt seems to hit whatever Tim Lincecum throws at him. So does Aaron Hill....

headline.main: D-Backs Send Giants to 6th Straight Loss, 4-1
headline.print_headline: D-Backs Send Giants to 6th Straight Loss, 4-1

docs.snippet: The number of French émigrés was four times higher in the first three months of the year than in the same period a year earlier, in part because of a weak economy and anti-Semitism....
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of French émigrés was four times higher in the first three months of the year than in the same period a year earlier, in part because of a weak economy and anti-Semitism.
docs.abstract: Jewish Agency for Israel, which coordinates migration to Israel, says number of French Jews relocating to Israel is four times higher in the first three months of 2014 than for the same period in 2013; Jewish leaders say emigration is being driven by combination of factors, but the main catalyst is seeming greater acceptance of anti-Semitism in France.

headline.main: Number of French Jews Emigrating to Israel Rises
headline.print_headline: Number of French Jews Emigrating to Israel Rises
